key_talking_points: Penalty on Edmonton's Evander Kane for high-sticking Carter Verhaeghe. Florida goes to the power play for 2 minutes at 19:23 remaining in the first period.
Florida has a chance to extend their lead early in the game. Let's see how Edmonton's penalty kill responds.
The series of hits before the penalty suggests a physical start to the game.
for_commentary_agent.context: The game is close with Florida leading by one goal. A penalty has just been called on Edmonton, giving Florida a power play early in the first. This warrants mixed coverage to describe the power play setup and discuss the implications of the penalty.

game_context.game_situation: FLA leads by 1 in the first period

high_intensity_events.summary: E. Kane (home) called for high-sticking on C. Verhaeghe (away)

task_details.specific_guidance: Focus on the Florida power play setup and any key matchups on the ice. Briefly mention the physical play leading up to the penalty.
